text: The first season of the American animated anthology series What If...? is based on the Marvel Comics series of the same name. It is part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU), but each episode is set in a different universe. Jeffrey Wright stars as the voice of the Watcher, the narrator of the series. Many actors from the MCU movies return to voice their characters, while some are replaced by other voice actors. The season premiered on Disney+ on August 11, 2021 and ended on October 6, after nine episodes. It is part of Phase Four of the MCU. It got positive reviews. A second season was released in 2023. == Episodes == == References == == Other websites == * What If...? title: What If...? (season 1)
